#summary NLS Tools - ant tasks for managing resource bundles

= Other Tools contained in annomark.jar =

== NLS (manage resource bundles) == 

Some [http://ant.apache.org/ ant]-tasks. You can use them with ant or maven2 (with maven-antrun-plugin).

  * [http://agimatec-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/annomark/com/agimatec/tools/nls/MessageBundleTask.html MessageBundleTask]
  * [http://agimatec-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/annomark/com/agimatec/tools/nls/Property2XMLConverterTask.html Property2XMLConverterTask]
  * [http://agimatec-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/annomark/com/agimatec/tools/nls/MergeLocaleTask.html MergeLocaleTask]
  * [http://agimatec-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/annomark/com/agimatec/tools/nls/AddLocaleTask.html AddLocaleTask]
  * [http://agimatec-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/annomark/com/agimatec/tools/nls/UpdateBundlesTask.html UpdateBundlesTask]
  * [http://agimatec-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/annomark/com/agimatec/tools/nls/OptimizeBundlesTask.html OptimizeBundlesTask]
  * [http://agimatec-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/annomark/com/agimatec/tools/nls/CopyBundlesTask.html CopyBundlesTask]

== Example ==

=== Resource Bundle as XML ===
{{{
<bundles>
  <bundle baseName="Example" interfaceName="com.agimatec.I_Example">
    <entry key="key1">
      <text locale="de">Beispieltext mit ÄÖÜ</text>
      <text locale="en">An example</text>
    </entry>
    <entry key="key2">
      <text locale="de">anderer Wert</text>
    </entry>
  </bundle>
</bundles>
}}}

=== Usage ===

This demonstrates the use of the NLS Tasks from within a maven2 pom.xml:

{{{
  <build>
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <id>generate bundles</id>
            <phase>generate-sources</phase>
            <configuration>
              <tasks>
                <taskdef name="addLocale"
                         classname="com.agimatec.tools.nls.AddLocaleTask">
                  <classpath refid="maven.test.classpath"/>
                </taskdef>

                <addLocale
                    fromXML="src/main/bundles/CustomerForm.xml"
                    locales="de_DE"
                    toXML="src/main/bundles/CustomerForm_de_DE.xml"/>

                <taskdef name="mergeLocale"
                         classname="com.agimatec.tools.nls.MergeLocaleTask">
                  <classpath refid="maven.test.classpath"/>
                </taskdef>

                <mergeLocale
                    fromXML="src/main/bundles/CustomerForm.xml"
                    xmlWithNewLocale="src/main/bundles/CustomerForm_de_DE_new.xml"
                    locales="da_DK"
                    toXML="src/main/bundles/CustomerForm_de_DE.xml"/>

                <taskdef name="msgbundle"
                         classname="com.agimatec.tools.nls.MessageBundleTask">
                  <classpath refid="maven.test.classpath"/>
                </taskdef>

                <msgbundle overwrite="true" bundles="src/main/bundles/CustomerForm.xml;../base/src/main/bundles/Common.xml"
                           writeProperties="true"
                           writeJson="true"
                           jsonPath="src\main\webapp\js"
                           jsonFile="i18n"
                           propertyPath="src\main\webapp\WEB-INF\classes"/>
              </tasks>
            </configuration>
            <goals>
              <goal>run</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
}}}
